column2: Edison Nation, Inc. offers innovation sourcing, product design, sales, manufacturing, and fulfillment services. The company is headquartered in Bethlehem, Pennsylvania. The Company, through its subsidiaries, S.R.M. Entertainment Limited (SRM) and Ferguson Containers, Inc. (Fergco) is design, manufacture and sale of a variety of toy and packaging materials products to retailers or direct to consumers via e-commerce and industrial and pharmaceutical companies in North America, Asia and Europe. The firm operates through two segments: SRM and Fergco. Its products include harry potter sorting hat, harry potter wand, pluto popcorn bucket, mickey mouse light chaser, hyperlight santa blocks, transformers vanquish, star wars bb8 droid spin top, boba fett blaster, star wars force push, and avatar glow spear.
